reviewText:
If you order this from amazon, they just send you another copy of her "American Dining and Entertaining Etiquette" DVD. And going to the Author's website, she doesn't publish a DVD version version of this title.

This entry appears to misleading. You should only buy the VHS version of this title. It appears to be a TV interview with her about the Mrs. Illinois competition rather than plates, forks and napkins.

Those interested in this topic should also consider "The Art of the Table: A Complete Guide to Table Setting, Table Manners, and Tableware" by Suzanne Von Drachenfels.
